The readers faculty is a queer one. He has the power to
make houses and countries visible, men and women and their
thoughts and emotions , from marks on a printed page.
He is not a scholar and so lacks many props, many
special tastes that control, and direct.
[anticipate? concentrate?]
He has a sensibility that millions of perfectly
literate people, who 'read' the paper, are without.
And in the play, "hen the body of the actor is visible,
and in him with all its implications,
some of the elements that the reader is able to extract

from the

shoulder. She strode off across the lawn. The house was

dormant; one thread of smoke
